sentences.sContent: Even their commitment to abolishing university tuition fees, a shibboleth in a party with a large student following, may be wavering.
sentences.sContent_eng: Even their commitment to abolishing university tuition fees, a shibboleth in a party with a large student following, may be wavering.
sentences.sCn: 他们许诺取消大学学费，这一政党的口令有大批学生拥护，可能会动摇。

synos.tran: 口令；（基督教《圣经》）考验用的词；特殊的习惯
